name: Chorley & South Ribble Model Society
body:
## Welcome
Chorley & South Ribble Model Society is a group of enthusiasts dedicated to the enjoyment of all forms of Radio control aircraft.

We welcome all pilots of fixed wing, rotary wing, glider and electric models to our Flying Club.

We have approximately 20 members of all ages and interests, the club is affiliated to the national body BMFA.
The clubs field is situated on the outskirts of Chorley in the Yarrow Valley Country Park, most types of models can be accommodated.

All types of model aircraft are welcome and there is no limit on engine size or model size. However, it is a condition of our license to stay within the noise limits defined by both the local council and the BMFA.

To take a quick look at where we fly, what we fly, and who flies, feel free to browse our website and be sure to check out our gallery.

We welcome inquiries from people wishing to join whether they are experienced flyer's or new to the hobby.

## Flying Times

Mondays, Wednesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays are Electric / Silent Flight only.

**Summer (BST)**  
Monday 2:00pm 8:00pm  
Tuesday 2:00pm 8:00pm  
Wednesday 2:00pm 8:00pm  
Thursday 2:00pm 8:00pm  
Friday 2:00pm 8:00pm  
Saturday 11:00am 4:00pm  
Sunday 11:00am 4:00pm  
  
**Winter (GMT)**  
Monday 12:00pm 6:00pm  
Tuesday 12:00pm 6:00pm  
Wednesday 12:00pm 6:00pm  
Thursday 12:00pm 6:00pm  
Friday 12:00pm 6:00pm  
Saturday 11:00pm 4:00pm  
Sunday 11:00am 4:00pm  
  
**Bank Holidays**  
Easter Monday 12:00pm 5:00pm  
Mayday 12:00pm 5:00pm  
Spring 12:00pm 5:00pm  
August 12:00pm 5:00pm  
  
**Exclusions**  
Christmas Day  
Good Friday  
Easter Sunday  
Remembrance Sunday  

## Find Us
Birkacre Lower Meadow, Chorley
